SEARCH
Package GameEngine

Class Game_P

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.Game_P
public class Game_P extends Object
The Game_P class represents the main game interface where the player interacts with the game environment.

    • Game_P

      public void Game_P(int level, int levelC)
      Initializes and starts the game with the specified level and current level configuration.
      Parameters:
      level - The level of the game.
      levelC - The current car level .

    • CalculoFrame

      public double CalculoFrame(double acceleration)
      Calculates the number of frames required based on the given acceleration(Used for NPC acceleration).
      Parameters:
      acceleration - The acceleration value.
      Returns:
      The calculated number of frames.

    • CalculoFramePL

      public double CalculoFramePL(double acceleration, int frame)
      Calculates the number of frames required based on the given acceleration and player's level configuration.
      Parameters:
      acceleration - The player acceleration value.
      frame - The frame configuration for the player's level(given by the car level).
      Returns:
      The calculated number of frames.

    • CalculoSeg

      public double CalculoSeg(double Frame)
      Calculates the time in seconds based on the given frame count.
      Parameters:
      Frame - The frame count.
      Returns:
      The calculated time in seconds.
